alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 27 at 2:13PM CDT until October 28 at 11:13AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River at Dallas. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, Some low water crossings inundated with cattle and grazing and low water areas under water. At 32.0 feet, Minor flooding of agricultural lands used for cattle grazing will occur. Low water crossings near the river will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 36.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 30.0 feet. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will remain near 36 feet this afternoon, then fall below flood stage late this evening. Additional rises are possible with additional rain today and tomorrow. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
